column4: I have  Powerbook G4 and the fan will not run. It is the same computer mentioned in the first post of this thread: http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=222413. I am having the same problem of the computer shutting down after a lot of work.
you can always get a liveCD, chroot to your env, then update
I did, it fails even using a live cd
